isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - SHORT SLEEPER LOWER SIDE TRIM PANEL

svcproc.title: SHORT SLEEPER LOWER SIDE TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Passenger Side Lower Side Trim Panel on Short Sleeper Cab

step1.para:
If so equipped, remove passenger side air line cabinets, refer to
SHORT SLEEPER AIR LINE CABINETS
.

Remove sleeper window assembly rubber trim (Item 5, Figure 83)
from around window opening of lower side trim panel (Item 3, Figure 79) , passenger side shown. Lay sleeper window assembly rubber trim out of the way and save for installation.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 79 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove three push-in fasteners (Item 1), these fasteners go through the B-pillar trim panel (Item 2) and the lower side trim panel (Item 3), passenger side shown. Lay push-in fasteners out of the way and save for installation.
Remove three push-in fasteners (Item 4) across the top of lower side trim panel (Item 3), passenger side shown. Lay push-in fasteners out of the way and save for installation.
Remove two push-in fasteners (Item 5) just below sleeper window, passenger side shown. Lay push-in fasteners out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 79. Passenger Side Lower Side Trim Panel on Short Sleeper Cab

note.para:
You will need to remove three push-in fasteners (Items 1, Figure 80)
on the left side of back trim panel (Items 2, Figure 80)
to access the remaining three push-in fasteners (Items 6, Figure 79)
of the lower side trim panel (Items 2, Figure 79)
as follows.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 80 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove three push-in fasteners (Item 1) on left side of back trim panel (Item 2). Lay push-in fasteners out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 80. Passenger Side Lower Side Trim Panel and Back Trim Panel on Short Sleeper Cab

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 79 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para:
Pull left side of back trim panel (Item 2, Figure 80)
out to access hidden push-in fasteners (Item 6). Remove three push-in fasteners (Item 6) along the rear of lower side trim panel (Item 3), passenger side shown. Lay push-in fasteners out of the way and save for installation.
Once all the push-in fasteners have been removed, slide lower side trim panel (Item 3) from behind B-pillar trim panel (Item 2). Lay lower side trim panel out of the way and save for installation.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side lower side trim panel on short sleeper cab.
